basics.name: Gustavo Epichin Monjardim
basics.label: Software developer
basics.summary: Software developer who is passionate about the JavaScript programming language and its ecosystem. I build frontend applications with technologies such as React, React Native, Jest and GraphQL.

work.summary: Responsible for the architectural design and development of web applications with React and mobile applications with React Native. Using GraphQL to communicate with the backend, Jest and testing-library for automated tests, storybook for the elaboration of a component library and fastlane for automated releases.

Responsible for the architectural design and development of multiple front-end applications for a ticket sales platform. All applications were made with Vue.js. Electron was also used for Desktop applications. Mobile applications were developed with Quasar.

Full-stack developer of a web application responsible for displaying interactive keys uploaded by researchers. The application was built with Express.js. MongoDB and Mongoose were used for managing data. The front-end of the application was built with the template engine Pug and JavaScript.
